description:
This Dead Sea Mud Mask contains 30 Treatments which lasts for 3-4 Months. Each treatment provides the ingredients and results of a $120 facial at a high end dermatology spa! 

Made with Pure Dead Sea Mud with the highest concentration of minerals - vital for facial skin treatment glow.This mask is made by the Dead Sea experts and contains the highest and freshest concentration of Dead Sea Mud.
